Articles.Content: Hello, just wanted to check in! And see how other kerbalnaughts are doing!
Hi! Just got the game on Steam. Downloading it as we speak. I'm fine, you?

Hi! Just got the game on Steam. Downloading it as we speak. I'm fine, you?

Nice, It'll be good to have some veteran players on the steam version.

Add me my steam is a funny name i like it because people say replies to me, But add me to your friends list my steam name is what does the fox say? (As i said funny haha)

The steam version is actually the same as the non steam one for mods incase you did not know.
Can you give me your steam id instead? I might not know which one is you because there will be a lot of other people with the same name.

Can you give me your steam id instead? I might not know which one is you because there will be a lot of other people with the same name.

Alrighty then

STEAM_0:1:43856843 Never done it before so here it is.

Alrighty then

STEAM_0:1:43856843 Never done it before so here it is.

Woops, sorry. I meant your steam url.

Woops, sorry. I meant your steam url.

Oh.... Alrighty then.
